summary: This is just a re-upload of the Dark Rainbow version of the last Wars in Skyrim to be published. No edits, although I may try my hand at it at some point.
descriptionHtml:
This is just a re-upload of the Dark Rainbow version of the last Wars in Skyrim to be published. No edits, although I may try my hand at it at some point. Please do develop any plug-ins you want, I\'ll link the best ones to this page.
[Video]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kgrgGo3t8CY[/Video]
And for new people, you can watch that video to have it explained quickly.

And yes, this does work when combined with Civil Unrest, they use different systems for spawning enemies. This adds new spawn points, Unrest edit existing ones.
author: Alexandrox
